text: The Audi Cup 2017 (the fifth edition of the Audi Cup) was a two-day football tournament in Munich, Germany. The participating teams were Bayern Munich, Atlético de Madrid, S.S.C. Napoli and Liverpool. ==Matches== == Top scorers == ;1 goal * Keidi Bare (Atlético Madrid) * José Callejón (Napoli) * Roberto Firmino (Liverpool) * Emanuele Giaccherini (Napoli) * Kalidou Koulibaly (Napoli) * Sadio Mané (Liverpool) * Mohamed Salah (Liverpool) * Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) * Fernando Torres (Atlético Madrid) * Luciano Vietto (Atlético Madrid) == References == Category:2017 in European football Category:2010s in Munich Category:Audi Cup Category:August 2017 events
title: Audi Cup 2017
